DataMap	Xpath	PS360CustomField
Patient Name	/PatientData/Patient/PatientName	LCS_PatientName
Patient ID	/PatientData/Patient/PatientID	LCS_PatientID
Study Instance UID	/PatientData/Study/StudyInstanceUID	LCS_StudyInstanceUID
Study Accession Number	/PatientData/Study/AccessionNumber	LCS_AccessionNumber
Image DateTime	/PatientData/Image/DateTime	LCS_DateTime
Study Date	/PatientData/Image/StudyDate	LCS_StudyDate
Study Time	/PatientData/Image/StudyTime	LCS_StudyTime
